statements: SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics
SELECT id, latency_ms FROM network_performance_metrics
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE latency_ms < 10
SELECT id, packet_loss FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY packet_loss DESC
SELECT bandwidth_usage_mb, packet_loss FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE bandwidth_usage_mb > 100
SELECT id, latency_ms, bandwidth_usage_mb, packet_loss FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE latency_ms < 20 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, latency_ms, bandwidth_usage_mb, packet_loss FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE bandwidth_usage_mb > 100 ORDER BY latency_ms ASC, packet_loss DESC
SELECT id, latency_ms, bandwidth_usage_mb, packet_loss FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE packet_loss >= 0.05 ORDER BY bandwidth_usage_mb DESC
SELECT latency_ms, bandwidth_usage_mb, packet_loss FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE latency_ms BETWEEN 10 AND 30 ORDER BY packet_loss ASC, id DESC
SELECT id, ROUND(latency_ms, 2) AS rounded_latency, TRUNCATE(bandwidth_usage_mb, 1) AS truncated_bandwidth FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE packet_loss < 0.1 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics;
SELECT metric_id, latency_ms FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE bandwidth_usage_mb > 50;
SELECT metric_id, packet_loss FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE latency_ms < 10.0;
SELECT ap.analysis_id, nd.analysis_result FROM analysis_data ad INNER JOIN network_performance_metrics nd ON ad.metric_id = nd.metric_id ORDER BY ad.analysis_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY latency_ms DESC, bandwidth_usage_mb ASC
SELECT metric_id, latency_ms FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE packet_loss > 0.1
SELECT analysis_result FROM analysis_data WHERE metric_id = 3
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics WHERE latency_ms < 10 AND bandwidth_usage_mb > 100
SELECT * FROM network_performance_metrics ORDER BY bandwidth_usage_mb DESC, latency_ms ASC
SELECT * FROM NetworkLatencyMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, latency_ms FROM BandwidthUsageMetrics WHERE bandwidth_usage_mbps > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT timestamp, packet_loss_percent FROM PacketLossMetrics WHERE packet_loss_percent > 5 AND id < 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, latency_ms FROM NetworkLatencyMetrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM BandwidthUsageMetrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-03-01' AND latency_ms < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM NetworkLatencyMetrics WHERE latency_ms > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, bandwidth_usage_mbps FROM BandwidthUsageMetrics WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY bandwidth_usage_mbps ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, timestamp, packet_loss_percent FROM PacketLossMetrics WHERE packet_loss_percent < 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, timestamp, latency_ms FROM NetworkLatencyMetrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-06-01' AND timestamp < '2022-07-01' ORDER BY id DESC;

SELECT id, timestamp, bandwidth_usage_mbps, packet_loss_percent FROM BandwidthUsageMetrics b JOIN PacketLossMetrics p ON b.id = p.id WHERE bandwidth_usage_mbps > 100 AND packet_loss_percent = 0.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, latency_ms FROM network_metrics ORDER BY latency_ms DESC;
SELECT timestamp, latency_ms FROM latency_history WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT id, latency_ms, bandwidth_usage_mb FROM network_metrics WHERE latency_ms < 50 AND bandwidth_usage_mb > 100;
SELECT timestamp, packet_loss FROM packet_loss_history WHERE packet_loss >= 0.05 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, latency_ms, bandwidth_usage_mb FROM network_metrics WHERE packet_loss > 0.2 ORDER BY latency_ms DESC;
SELECT timestamp, latency_ms FROM latency_history WHERE latency_ms < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT MAX(bandwidth_usage_mb) AS max_bandwidth, MIN(bandwidth_usage_mb) AS min_bandwidth FROM bandwidth_history;
SELECT avg(packet_loss) AS avg_packet_loss FROM packet_loss_history WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM network_latency_metrics;
SELECT id, latency_ms, timestamp FROM bandwidth_usage_metrics WHERE bandwidth_usage_mb > 100;
SELECT id, packet_loss_percent FROM packet_loss_metrics ORDER BY packet_loss_percent DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT id, average_latency_ms, average_bandwidth_usage_mb, timestamp FROM network_performance_summary WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM network_latency_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, latency_ms FROM network_latency_metrics WHERE latency_ms > 50 ORDER BY latency_ms ASC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Router' ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT * FROM network_performance_summary WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT device_id, location FROM network_devices WHERE location LIKE '%Server%';
